message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $170. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I can't go as low as $100.  Would you consider $140?
I understand that you're not willing to go as low as $100, but $140 is still a bit above my budget. Would you consider $130? I'm willing to meet you halfway.
